class petstore.ch3.domain.PetType
petTypeId, petType
1, "dog"
2, "cat"
3, "bird"

class petstore.ch3.domain.Person
personId, firstName, lastName
1, "joe", "smith"
2, "minnie", "mouse"
3, "mickey", "mouse"

class petstore.ch3.domain.Pet
petName, personId, petAge, petTypeId
"fluffy", 1, 2, 1
"diamond", 2, 3, 2
"charlie", 3, 10, 3
